modules.title: Introduction to SQL
modules.description: Learn what SQL is, its history, and why it is important in database management.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Setting Up SQL Environment
modules.description: Install and configure MySQL/PostgreSQL and set up a sample database.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: SQL Data Types
modules.description: Understand different data types in SQL, including numeric, string, date/time, and special types.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: SQL Constraints & Rules
modules.description: Learn about PRIMARY KEY, FOREIGN KEY, UNIQUE, CHECK, and NOT NULL constraints in SQL.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Basic SQL Queries
modules.description: Learn SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE queries and basic filtering with WHERE.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: SQL Joins & Subqueries
modules.description: Understand INNER, LEFT, RIGHT, FULL joins and write effective subqueries.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: SQL Views, Indexing & Performance Optimization
modules.description: Learn how to create views, use indexing, and optimize query performance.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Stored Procedures & Triggers
modules.description: Understand stored procedures, functions, and triggers in SQL.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Transactions & Concurrency Control
modules.description: Learn about ACID properties, transactions, and handling concurrent operations.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Advanced SQL: Window Functions & CTEs
modules.description: Explore RANK, DENSE_RANK, ROW_NUMBER, and common table expressions (CTEs).
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Final SQL Capstone Project
modules.description: Build a complete HR management system using SQL.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Top 50 SQL Interview Questions
modules.description: Practice frequently asked SQL questions for technical interviews.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Final Capstone: Scalable Social Media Database
modules.description: Design and implement a scalable database for a social media platform.
modules.author: CSExplore Team
